name: Fortress Clicker
description:
Fortress Clicker – Battle Monsters

Don a hero's armor in the exciting app Fortress Clicker. Rule a peaceful village surrounded by a mighty stone wall. But appearances deceive. Dark clouds are gathering over the towers of your defensive structures. Lightning flashes across the sky, and danger approaches from the forests nearby. The monsters are attacking! Tirelessly, they pound away at your stone walls. Improve your defenses in this thrilling clicker game, upgrade your weapon power and take the fight straight to the invading monsters. Fortress Clicker is an entertaining idle game that will whisk you back to the middle ages, where you can discover countless clicker game features.

• various gaming areas in your village, including a gold mine, quarry, saw mill, treasury and an upgradable weapons arsenal
• opportunities to make work in the clicker game more efficient; for example by using dwarves to help mine stone and gold
• a wide range of weapons with different levels of damage to help you fend off the monstrous onslaught – including hardwood bows with fire, poison or frost arrows
• fragments that can be used to empower the village crystal
• upgrades to your idle game defensive fortifications to battle, catch and collect the attacking monsters
• a fascinating medieval setting for a visually appealing app
• action-packed and humorous clicker game story

Fortress Clicker – A Special Idle Game Experience

Become a clicker hero now! Defend your village from monster attacks, fortify your walls and fight bravely against terrifying creatures. Mine gold and stones in the idle game, unlock additional buildings and improve your weapons. Discover the fascinating Fortress Clicker app. Dive into the wonderful world of this extraordinary and unique clicker app!
